title: 820-3330 artefacts
message: This board works ok if use it to write text but as soon as open Chrome and try to watch videos, artefacts appears and image freeze. Could be N13P-GT-W-A2?

title: 820-3330 artefacts
message: Nope GPU is fine and it is a hopeless problem with these boards. I have tried everything and think the problem is inside the board with these.
